name: Space Bang (itch)
description:
Top-Down Space Shooter made while learning C# and Unity through my graduation in Jogos Digitais.

This is an Integrating Project for the second semester of my college.

The goal is to survive in the given time and rack up as many points as you can.

CONTROLS:

Key Action W Up S Down A Left D Right Left Mouse Button Fire Mouse Scroll Weapon Switching

CREDITS:

Game Designer Jefferson Fillipe 2D Artist Vitória Moura UI Artist Guilherme Soares Programmer Jefferson Fillipe Sound Engineer Douglas Moura,
Guilherme Soares AuxiliaryEnzo Tomaz

Background Music from OpenGameArt.

Background Image from OpenGameArt.
